amendment.description: To establish a National Catastrophe Risks Consortium and a National Homeowners' Insurance Stabilization Program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 4709 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 4709 proposed by Senator Nelson FL to Amendment SA 4707. (consideration: CR S3880-3882) To establish a National Catastrophe Risks Consortium and a National Homeowners' Insurance Stabilization Program, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4709 proposed by Senator Nelson FL to Amendment SA 4707.
